mapper.sql: ID_COMPARE_SQL AS compareSqlId , ID_DATABASE AS databaseId , ID_REFERENCE_DB AS referenceDbId , ID_COMPARE_TABLE_GROUP AS compareTableGroupId , COMPARE_NAME AS compareName , COMPARE_DESC AS compareDesc , COMPARE_TYPE AS compareType , SQL AS sql , REFERENCE_SQL AS referenceSql , CREATE_TIME AS createTime , USER_ID AS userId , CREATE_USER AS createUser , UPDATE_USER AS updateUser , UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , DEL_FLAG AS delFlag
